tool_description: Classifies words or languages into their respective language families and subfamilies based on linguistic features and known genealogical relationships.
error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: words and source_languages arrays must have the same length.
Unrecognized language: One or more languages are not in the classification database.
Empty input: At least one word-language pair must be provided.
Invalid language format: Use standard ISO language codes or recognized language names.
usage: Provide arrays of words and their corresponding source languages. The tool will classify each language into its language family hierarchy.

classifications.description: Language family classifications for each input language

family_groups.description: Grouped language families found in the input
